channel.title: guide on Dr Daft
channel.description: Recent content in guide on Dr Daft

item.title: Obligatory 'hello world' post
item.description: What is this place? Why hello there! (He says in his best Obi Wan voice) Welcome to this blog. As is my cultural tradition I should have something spread out for guests like sweets or a beverage. Bare with me while I gather things here, this is my first post after all and there is still some scaffolding around the place. I don’t think this is a right of passage in any way, I’ve made and forgotten many blogs in the past.
